    • EdUOCationController

      public EdUOCationController(String schoolsFilename, String teachersFilename, String courseFilename, String studentGroupsFilename, String enrollmentsFilename)
      Constructor that loads the data from the files
      Parameters:
      schoolsFilename - Name of the file with the schools data
      teachersFilename - Name of the file with the teachers data
      courseFilename - Name of the file with the courses data
      studentGroupsFilename - Name of the file with the student groups data
      enrollmentsFilename - Name of the file with the enrollments data

    • addCourse

      public void addCourse(String type, String name, String code, int credits, int hours, String teacherNif, String additionalInfo)
      Add a student group to the controller
      Parameters:
      type - Type of the course
      name - Name of the course
      code - Code of the course
      credits - Credits of the course
      hours - Hours of the course
      teacherNif - NIF of the teacher
      additionalInfo - Additional information for the course (exam or practice information)

    • addStudentGroup

      public void addStudentGroup(String schoolName, String groupName, String tutorNIF, String[] studentData)

      Parameters:
      schoolName - Name of the school
      groupName - Name of the group
      tutorNIF - NIF of the tutor
      studentData - Array of the students data

    • addEnrollment

      public void addEnrollment(String studentNIF, String courseCode, String semester, String enrollmentType, String additionalInfo)
      Add an enrollment to the student
      Parameters:
      studentNIF - NIF of the student
      courseCode - Code of the course
      semester - Semester of the enrollment
      enrollmentType - Type of the enrollment (individual or multiple)
      additionalInfo - Additional information for the enrollment

    • updateEnrollmentMark

      public boolean updateEnrollmentMark(String course, String semester, String status, String studentNif, double mark)
      Updates a student's enrollment mark and status.
      Parameters:
      course - the course name.
      semester - the semester.
      status - the enrollment status.
      studentNif - the student's NIF.
      mark - the new mark.
      Returns:
      true if updated successfully, false otherwise.

      private void addCourseWithExam(String name, String code, Integer credits, Integer hours, UserTeacher teacher, String additionalInfo)
      Adds a course with an associated exam.
      Parameters:
      name - the course name.
      code - the course code.
      credits - the number of credits.
      hours - the number of hours.
      teacher - the assigned teacher.
      additionalInfo - additional exam details.

      hours - the number of hours.
      teacher - the assigned teacher.
      additionalInfo - additional practice group details.
